summary: Believe, believe, the Dragonstoned comes! Psilocybin mushrooms and mushroom tea.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/nzler.png[/img]
22/02/2012: Added Fly Amanita Berserk Mode optional package.

[b][size="2"]Update: Video and Original Song by Chickenbrothel
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QWPnkh-5mq
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QWPnkh-5mqI[/youtube]

Video by bal5050
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aF3enyyYSGY

Video by SicSix6
http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=AWjfp-9xhRw
[/b][/size]

Now the Dragonborn can try the experiences of Psilocybin Mushrooms. 10 types of mushrooms that alter the perceptions of everything, and you can also create a Mushroom Tea mixing all the mushrooms + 1 Moon Sugar at the cooking pot. Each one of the mushrooms provide a different trip, some of them you can even have visions of Dremoras and wolves. The Mushroom Tea gives a longer and stronger trip, so be careful to take some of them during battle. It's possible also to take two mushrooms at once, causing even more bizarre trips. You can find the mushrooms and the tea at random potion vendors, but remember they are hard to be available.
There is also a book named Crassius' Mushroom Diary (some of you may remember that name from Morrowind). I pretend in the future to add a quest to get the mushrooms, once i figure out how to do it.

Here's the full list of the mushrooms:


01 Psilocybe Cubensis xx000d62
02 Conocybe Cyanopus xx000d63
03 Gymnopilus Purpuratus xx000d65
04 Panaeolus Cinctulus xx000d67
05 Psilocybe Weilii xx000d6b
06 Psilocybe Serbica xx000d69
07 Psilocybe Baeocystis xx000d6d
08 Psilocybe Azurescens xx000d6f
09 Psilocybe Semilanceata xx000d71
10 Psilocybe stuntzii xx000d73

-- Mushroom Tea xx0012d7
-- Crassius' Mushroom Diary xx00183c

Enjoy!
author: Dogola
